oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Votes for Women a Success The Map Proves It (map of United States) Alaska 1913 Help Make The Southern States White
WHITE STATES: Full Suffrage SHADED STATES: Taxation, Bond or School Suffrage DOTTED STATE: Presidential, Partial County and State, Municipal Suffrage BLACK STATES: No Suffrage 4 Don't you want to join the Southern States Woman Suffrage Conference? Membership costs but $1 per year. Fill out the following blank and mail to headquarters. MEMBERSHIP APPLICATION. Southern States Woman Suffrage Conference, Headquarters: 301 Carondelet St. New Orleans, La I WISH TO ENROLL AS A MEMBER 0F THE SOUTHERN STATES WOM- AN SUFFRAGE CONFERENCE. Name
Address Annual Dues $1.
